patch:
@@ -1,11 +1,11 @@
-﻿﻿<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+﻿<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
 <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
   xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/maven-v4_0_0.xsd">
   <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
   <parent>
     <groupId>${groupId}</groupId>
     <artifactId>${rootArtifactId}</artifactId>
-     <version>${app.version}</version>
+    <version>${app.version}</version>
   </parent>
   <artifactId>${rootArtifactId}-core</artifactId>
   <packaging>jar</packaging>
@@ -66,7 +66,7 @@
 
     <!-- auto-configure datasource
       https://stackoverflow.com/questions/34964066/spring-boot-doesnt-use-datasource-properties
-      -->
+    -->
     <dependency>
       <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
       <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-jdbc</artifactId>
@@ -122,50 +122,50 @@
 
     <!-- Database -->
     <dependency>
-#if ($dbType == 'h2')
+      #if ($dbType == 'h2')
       <groupId>com.h2database</groupId>
       <artifactId>h2</artifactId>
-#elseif ($dbType == 'hsqldb')
+      #elseif ($dbType == 'hsqldb')
       <groupId>org.hsqldb</groupId>
       <artifactId>hsqldb</artifactId>
       <version>2.4.0</version>
-#elseif ($dbType == 'postgresql')
+      #elseif ($dbType == 'postgresql')
       <groupId>org.postgresql</groupId>
       <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId>
-      <!--<version>9.4.1211.jre7</version>-->
-#elseif ($dbType == 'mysql')
+      <!--<version>9.4.1211.jre7</version> -->
+      #elseif ($dbType == 'mysql')
       <groupId>mysql</groupId>
       <artifactId>mysql-connector-java</artifactId>
       <version>8.0.8-dmr</version>
-#elseif ($dbType == 'mariadb')
+      #elseif ($dbType == 'mariadb')
       <groupId>org.mariadb.jdbc</groupId>
       <artifactId>mariadb-java-client</artifactId>
       <version>1.5.4</version>
-#elseif ($dbType == 'hana')
+      #elseif ($dbType == 'hana')
       <groupId>com.sap.cloud.db.jdbc</groupId>
       <artifactId>ngdbc</artifactId>
       <version>2.3.48</version>
-#elseif ($dbType == 'oracle')
+      #elseif ($dbType == 'oracle')
       <groupId>com.oracle.jdbc</groupId>
       <artifactId>ojdbc8</artifactId>
       <version>12.2.0.1</version>
-#elseif ($dbType == 'mssql')
+      #elseif ($dbType == 'mssql')
       <groupId>com.microsoft.sqlserver</groupId>
       <artifactId>mssql-jdbc</artifactId>
       <version>6.4.0.jre8</version>
-#else
+      #else
       <groupId>$dbType</groupId>
       <artifactId>$dbType</artifactId>
       <version>TODO</version>
-#end
+      #end
     </dependency>
-#if ($dbType != 'h2')
+    #if ($dbType != 'h2')
     <dependency>
       <groupId>com.h2database</groupId>
       <artifactId>h2</artifactId>
       <scope>test</scope>
     </dependency>
-#end
+    #end
 
     <!-- Flyway for DB Schema version management and migration -->
     <dependency>
@@ -230,7 +230,7 @@
     <profile>
       <id>embedded</id>
       <activation>
-       <activeByDefault>true</activeByDefault>
+        <activeByDefault>true</activeByDefault>
       </activation>
       <dependencies>
         <dependency>
